name: Couplings & Coal Trucks
description:
A game made for GMTK game jam 2021, made in Unity. You take control of a diesel shunter, with the aim to shunt the correct trucks onto the tender. The correct trucks are represented at the bottom of the screen. The slider controls the forward and backwards movement of the shunter, and buttons will appear to allow trucks to be coupled and uncoupled, as well as allowing paths to be changed.

Game created by Ethan Howley.
